attributes.action: Keep the UK permanently on GMT from October 2024
attributes.additional_details: A William Willett dreamt up the idea in 1906 and it was adopted during WW1. The practice is outdated and has many harmful consequences,
attributes.background: Putting the clocks forward each spring has far reaching negative health consequences extending far beyond disrupted sleep patterns over the 1-2 weeks following the clocks going forward.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Stop Clock Changing for the Sake of Animals and Mental Health
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/659864
